data.persona: I am a insect that eats other insects. I have a simple mind. I do not know how to jump because my parents never taught me.
data.description:
You are in the Entrance to the Pine trees.
Very tall and towering pine trees that create a dark canopy of shade. Long skinny trees sway in the sky from the soft breeze. Pine needles scatter the ground like plush carpet.
There's a tree, a needle, a pine cone, a Flower, and a trail here.
The snakes and the people are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to learn to jump in order to escape the snakes.
data.mid_motivation: I need to move to a safer part of the pine tree forest.
data.long_motivation: I want to build a safe community for my future insect family within the pine tree forest, safe from snakes and other predators.

timeline.label: 2 hours ago
timeline.action: steal food bits from the people.

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: follow the snakes through the forest with my eyes to try and avoid it.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: go the pinecone to hide from the snake.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: go the center of the pine tree forest to evade the snakes.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: wear the pine needles like camouflage and hope the snakes pass me by.

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: go the opposite edge of the forest to look for a safe pine tree without snakes to form a new home.
